Verses: 1 appatiye Keeriyaadhyaareemin Manushar Vandhu, Karththarutaiya Pettiyai Etuththu, Mettin Melirukkira Apinadhaapin Veettile Kontuvandhu Vaiththu,karththarutaiya Pettiyaik Kaakkumpatikku, Avan Kumaaranaakiya Eleyaasaaraip Parisuththappatuththinaarkal.
2 petti Keeriyaadhyaareemile Aneka Naal Thangiyirundhadhu; Irupadhu Varusham Angeye Irundhadhu; Isravel Kutumpaththaarellaarum Karththarai Ninaiththu, Pulampikkontirundhaarkal.

3 appozhudhu Saamuvel Isravel Kutumpaththaar Yaavaraiyum Nokki: Neengal Ungal Muzhu Irudhayaththotum Karththaritaththil Thirumpukiravarkalaanaal, Anniya Thevarkalaiyum Asdharoththaiyum Ungal Natuvilirundhu Vilakki, Ungal Irudhayaththaik Karththarukku Neraakki, Avar Oruvarukke Aaraadhanaiseyyungal; Appozhudhu Avar Ungalaip Pelisdharutaiya Kaikku Neengalaakkivituvaar Endraan.
4 appozhudhu Isravel Puththirar Paakaalkalaiyum Asdharoththaiyum Vilakkivittu, Karththar Oruvarukke Aaraadhanaiseydhaarkal.
5 pinpu Saamuvel: Naan Ungalukkaakak Karththarai Mandraatumpatikku, Isravelar Ellaaraiyum Mispaavile Koottungal Endraan.

6 avarkal Appatiye Mispaavile Kootivandhu Thanneer Montu, Karththarutaiya Sannidhiyil Ootri, Andraiya Thinam Upavaasampanni, Karththarukkuvirodhamaaip Paavanjeydhom Endru Ange Sonnaarkal; Mispaavile Saamuvel Isravel Puththirarai Niyaayam Visaariththukkontirundhaan.

7 isravel Puththirar Mispaavile Kootivandhadhaip Pelisdhar Kelvippattapodhu, Pelisdharin Adhipadhikal Isravelukku Virodhamaaka Edhirththu Vandhaarkal; Adhai Isravel Puththirar Kettu, Pelisdharinimiththam Payappattu,
8 saamuvelai Nokki: Nammutaiya Thevanaakiya Karththar Engalaip Pelisdharin Kaikku Neengalaakki Ratchikkumpatikku, Engalukkaaka Avarai Nokki Oyaamal Ventikkollum Endraarkal.

9 appozhudhu Saamuvel Paalkutikkira Oru Aattukkuttiyaip Pitiththu, Adhaik Karththarukkuch Charvaanga Thakanapaliyaakach Cheluththi, Isravelukkaakak Karththarainokki Ventikkontaan; Karththar Avanukku Marumozhi Arulich Cheydhaar.

10 saamuvel Sarvaanga Thakanapaliyaich Cheluththukaiyil, Pelisdhar Isravelinmel Yuththampanna Nerunginaarkal; Karththar Makaa Periya Itimuzhakkangalaip Pelisdharmel Annaalile Muzhangappanni, Avarkalaik Kalangatiththadhinaal, Avarkal Isravelukku Munpaakap Pattu Vizhundhaarkal.
11 appozhudhu Isravelar Mispaavilirundhu Pelisdharaip Pin Thotarndhupoi, Pedhkaareem Pallaththaakkumattum Avarkalai Muriya Atiththaarkal.
12 appozhudhu Saamuvel Oru Kallai Etuththu, Mispaavukkum Senukkum Natuvaaka Niruththi, Immattum Karththar Engalukku Udhaviseydhaar Endru Solli, Adharku Epenesar Endru Perittaan.
13 indhappirakaaram Pelisdhar Appuram Isravelin Ellaiyile Varaadhapatikkuth Thaazhththappattaarkal; Saamuvelin Naalellaam Karththarutaiya Kai Pelisdharukku Virodhamaai Irundhadhu.

14 pelisdhar Isravel Kaiyilirundhu Pitiththirundha Ekron Thuvakkik Kaadhmattumulla Pattanangalum Isravelukkuth Thirumpak Kitaiththadhu; Avaikalaiyum Avaikalin Ellaikalaiyum Isravelar Pelisdhar Kaiyile Iraadhapatikku, Vituviththuk Kontaarkal; Isravelukkum Emoriyarukkum Samaadhaanam Untaayirundhadhu.
15 saamuvel Uyirotirundha Naalellaam Isravelai Niyaayam Visaariththaan.
16 avan Varushaavarusham Purappattu, Peththelaiyum Kilkaalaiyum Mispaavaiyum Sutrippoi, Avvitangalilellaam Isravelai Niyaayam Visaariththa Pinpu,
17 avan Raamaavukkuth Thirumpivaruvaan, Avanutaiya Veetu Ange Irundhadhu, Ange Isravelai Niyaayam Visaariththu, Avvitaththil Karththarukku Oru Palipeetaththaik Kattinaan.
